law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 82, effective June 17, 1978; and ch. 384, sec. 50, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Authority of bureau of education for exceptional children.
